channel.title: Homer on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Homer on Strat

item.title: The Iliad
item.description:
I love Greek mythology which definitely elevated my appreciation of this text.

If you’re not already a big fan of Greek mythology, you’re unlikely to get much out of it though.

item.title: The Odyssey
item.description: The Odyssey is a classic and there’s more stories that have been inspired by it than I can count. After reading it, you’ll be able to see it echoed everywhere you look.
